title: BRUTAL Halloween Costume Roast - KFAF
description:
Visit http://untuckit.com and use code MORNING for 20% off at checkout.

Go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/morning for 20% off your first box!

For $20 off a suitcase, visit http://awaytravel.com/morning and use promo code MORNING during checkout!

And and Nick sing a nice ode to Pumpkin Spice Lattes and then roast the hell out of everyone's old Halloween costumes...including their own! 

Time Stamps - 
Start - Pumpkin Spice Song
00:09:00 - Sink my WarBoat
00:15:10 - Roasting Your Halloween Costumes!
00:34:30 - Escape the Invasion
00:36:42 - Untuckit
00:38:39 - Away
00:42:03 - More Roasting Your Halloween Costumes!
01:02:05 - Next Week’s Photoshop Challenge
01:03:55 - Ask Andy Anything

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
